name: Superset - Great Learning
description: Superset is India's first Official University Recruiting Platform. Founded with the aim to consolidate and democratize India’s graduate hiring system, by connecting students and employers via college placement cells on a common platform, Superset helps universities streamline end-to-end placements process, equips employers with a single gateway to reach young college talent across the nation, and provides students increased number of authentic opportunities.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline:
Where Talent
 Meets Opportunity
ShortDescription: Superset helps fresh graduates get their first jobs, enables employers to recruit faster, and helps colleges streamline campus placements
enhanced_description: Superset is India's first Official University Recruiting Platform, founded with the aim to consolidate and democratize the nation's graduate hiring system. It operates as a common platform connecting students, employers, and college placement cells, facilitating end-to-end placement processes for universities and enabling employers to quickly recruit young college talent across India. The platform helps fresh graduates secure their first jobs by providing increased authentic opportunities, while also streamlining campus placements. Key features include System Security, Data Transfer, and Confidentiality.
competitive_advantages: First official university recruiting platform in India
Consolidates and democratizes graduate hiring across India
Provides a single national gateway for employers to access college talent
Increases authentic job opportunities for students
roi_benefits: Increased efficiency in campus recruitment processes for universities
Broader access to college talent for employers
Faster time-to-hire for fresher roles for employers
Enhanced access to authentic job opportunities for graduates
